articles.title: COVID symptom: Study shows loss of smell due to COVID could be reversed - Deseret News
articles.description: Scientists are developing methods to restore sense of smell after long-term loss due to COVID
articles.content:
Researchers at Thomas Jefferson University are developing a treatment for people who have lost their smell due to COVID-19.
